article.title: Congo

link.part: legend#5CD65C[[Republic of the Congo]]legend#3A963A[[Democratic Republic of the Congo]]TheCongo Riverforms most of the border between these two countries.

article.paragraph: TheCongo River(orKongoorKong) is a major river in Central Africa.
The term Congo may refer to two countries that border the Congo river:

list.listitem: the largerDemocratic Republic of the Congoto the southeast (capital: Kinshasa), formerly known as Zaire
the smallerRepublic of the Congoto the northwest (capital: Brazzaville)

article.paragraph: The name may also refer to:
